explains: n. 振动器；混和器；调酒器
n. （Shaker）人名；（阿拉伯、哈萨、乌兹、塔吉、吉尔、阿塞）沙克尔
wordGroup: shale shaker 振动筛；泥浆振动筛
cocktail shaker 鸡尾酒调制器

sentences.en: He went to the beautiful old Shaker dresser that graced this homely room.
sentences.cn: 他走向那个使这间陋室生辉的漂亮的夏克尔式旧橱柜。

sentences.en: Since shaking is not healthy, ethologists do not consider Shaker a behavioral gene.
sentences.cn: 由于颤动是不健康的，动物行为学家不认为颤动是一种行为基因。

sentences.en: For example, in the fruit fly, researchers have identified the gene Shaker, mutations in which cause flies to shake violently under anesthesia.
sentences.cn: 例如，在果蝇身上，研究人员发现了基因震荡器，这种突变导致果蝇在麻醉下剧烈摇晃。
